00029 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_exceptions;

00031 DataGroupReader::DataGroupReader(std::ifstream& is, DataGroupHeader& hdr)
00032 : fileStream(is), dataGroupHdr(hdr)
00033 {
00034 }
00035 
00036 DataGroupReader::~DataGroupReader()
00037 {
00038 }

00040 /*
00041  * Get the number of DataSets in the DataGroup
00042  */
00043 int32_t DataGroupReader::GetDataSetCnt() const
00044 {
00045         return dataGroupHdr.GetDataSetCnt();
00046 }
00047 
00048 /*
00049  * Get the name of the DataGroup
00050  */
00051 std::wstring DataGroupReader::GetDataGroupName() const
00052 {
00053         return dataGroupHdr.GetName();
00054 }
00055 
00056 /*
00057  * Get the DataSetReader by index
00058  */
00059 DataSetReader DataGroupReader::GetDataSetReader(int32_t index)
00060 {
00061         if (index < 0 || index > dataGroupHdr.GetDataSetCnt())
00062         {
00063           DataSetNotFoundException e(L"Calvin",L"Default Description, Please Update!",affymetrix_calvin_utilities::DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString(),std::string(__FILE__),(u_int16_t)__LINE__,0);
00064                 throw e;
00065         }
00066 
00067         DataSetHeader& dph = dataGroupHdr.GetDataSet(index);
00068         DataSetReader dpReader(fileStream, dph);
00069         return dpReader;
00070 }
00071 
00072 /*
00073  * Get the DataSetReader by name
00074  */
00075 DataSetReader DataGroupReader::GetDataSetReader(const std::wstring& name)
00076 {
00077         DataSetHeader* dph = dataGroupHdr.FindDataSetHeader(name);
00078         if (dph == 0)
00079         {
00080                 DataSetNotFoundException e(L"Calvin",L"Default Description, Please Update!",affymetrix_calvin_utilities::DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString(),std::string(__FILE__),(u_int16_t)__LINE__,0);
00081                 throw e;
00082         }
00083 
00084         DataSetReader dpReader(fileStream, *dph);
00085         return dpReader;
00086 }
